short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create AI-powered step-by-step tutorials in seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create Step-by-Step Tutorials Automatically. 100% free.

With Wizardshot, you can automatically create step-by-step tutorials simply by recording your screen. Our extension figures out what you're doing, takes screenshots and turns it all into a simple step-by-step guide. You can export them as PDF/DOC/HTML, or embed them into a knowledge base, via our native Helpjuice.com integration.

As you share your tutorials, we'll even keep track of the completion rate, providing you with a detailed view on which parts of your process people are stuck on

To record: 
1) Install the extension
2) Press record & perform your actions
3) Once done, press the stop button, and your tutorial will automatically be done

No sign up required, 100% free, forever.
